Title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
Writer: Elizabeth Kendall (based on the book "The Phantom Prince: My Life with Ted Bundy" by), Michael Werwie
Actors: Lily Collins, Zac Efron, Angela Sarafyan, Sydney Vollmer
Plot: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy from the perspective of Liz, his longtime girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.
Production: Netflix, COTA Films, Voltage Pictures, Ninjas Runnin' Wild Productions
